name: Air Fryer Grilled Peaches with Cinnamon
instructions: Preheat air fryer to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Place peach halves flesh side down in the basket of the air fryer. Cook for 6 minutes.
Meanwhile melt butter. Stir in brown sugar and cinnamon until sugar has dissolved.
Using tongs, flip peaches over so that they are flesh side up. Brush butter mixture over the top, filling the pit cavity with any excess. Cook for 6 minutes more.
Let peaches cool for 5 minutes. Top each half with a scoop of ice cream. Serve immediately.
